content: I'm trying to understand our options to weakly linked to macOS frameworks using weak_framework (https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/MacOSX/Conceptual/BPFrameworks/Concepts/WeakLinking.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20002378-107026). Are there others ways we could try to pass weak_framework instead of framework in the generated linker flags besides the usual ways (.cargo/config, attribute on externs, or build script like I attempted in https://github.com/gfx-rs/wgpu-native/issues/50#issuecomment-714829149)?
